meanings.sent1: The ribbed fabric felt bumpy to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The ribbed sweater kept me warm in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The ribbed surface of the road made the car ride feel like a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent4: The ribbed texture of the tree bark resembled a series of tiny hills.
meanings.sent5: The ribbed pattern on the ceiling added a unique touch to the room.

meanings.sent1: The ribbed metal roof provided extra strength to the building.
meanings.sent2: The ribbed hose allowed water to flow smoothly through it.
meanings.sent3: The ribbed design on the cake made it look like a delicious sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The ribbed structure of the bridge resembled a giant ladder.
meanings.sent5: The ribbed handle of the umbrella made it easy to grip.

meanings.sent1: The ribbed leaves of the plant helped with water retention.
meanings.sent2: The ribbed glass reflected light in interesting patterns.
meanings.sent3: The ribbed pattern on the carpet looked like a maze for tiny insects.
meanings.sent4: The ribbed texture of the painting added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The ribbed appearance of the clouds made them look like giant pillows.
